page.title: 06THE UNITED CHURCH
page.content: The{United Church}was built 11 years ago,when the{Danesholme Centre}was built.Previous to this it was situated in a bungalow on the estate.The first ministers came in 1973 and were Graham Smith(Baptist) and Ron Pritchard (C.of E).The present minister is Chris Shelly. This church is a{community church}and cubs,scouts,brownies,keep fit,parties and clinics all take place in the church.The services held are a weekly family service , a monthly service at Oakley Court,a shelted home,a weekly communion held in the chapel,and a house group in the evening.There is also a junior church and Junior club run by the church.
